summary:
Draco: *to Scorpius* As I did, and my father did before me, you will fall in love with a Potter
Scorpius: And will I marry...
body:
Draco: *to Scorpius* As I did, and my father did before me, you will fall in love with a Potter
Scorpius: And will I marry them?
Draco: Of course not! You'll love from afar

dialogue.phrase: *to Scorpius* As I did, and my father did before me, you will fall in love with a Potter

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: Of course not! You'll love from afar

blog.name: sniccals
blog.title: Crackship from Hell
blog.description: the only murdoc niccals/severus snape shipper on the fucking planet. // Ness, they/them. Blog mostly exists to plug my own fic lmfao. // Links

summary:
Some Anguine AU ideas ive had so far:
Sev and Murdoc are roommates. Somehow this did not ruin their friendship lmfao
Murdoc...
body:
Some Anguine AU ideas ive had so far:

  • Sev and Murdoc are roommates. Somehow this did not ruin their friendship lmfao
  • Murdoc showed up the first year without any supplies or a wand. It was, ahem, Unfortunate
  • His brother taught him some wandless goblin magic before this tho. Only baby stuff but it was a little something (that was before he got his letter oof)
  • Hannibal got really fucking pissed about murdoc getting to go to boarding school, but that’s a whole other rant
  • I like to think muds and sev do a lot better against their bullies together than they would alone. Either way, they stay close a lot just to be safe and are rarely seen apart
  • Murdoc doesn’t like Lily at all lmfao. Hes primarily Jealous and wont cop to it, but he also senses Lily looks down on Sev and him (whether or not its true, he thinks it is). He tries to hide it, but hes not honestly very good at it
  • Sevs never met hannibal but hes never really liked him, not after murdoc showed up on the train with a busted nose in 4th year. He doesnt care that hannibal introduced muds to the clash and goblin magic. He keeps it to himself tho
  • Flitwick tried to mentor Murdoc but Murdoc is paranoid about authority figures treating him too nicely and pushed him away
  • Sev likes muggle music a lot (im a sucker for that headcanon) and him and murdoc share some musical taste. Murdoc gives him cassettes hes either gotten from his brother or nicked from stores
  • Murdoc puts on a show of not caring about things, and he has trouble focusing, but he can be very detail oriented and precise when he applies himself. Bc of this he does awful in potions class but good when he works with Sev, and he always keeps track of things like what ingrediants Sev needs
  • Murdoc has smoked since he was 7 and got Sev into doing it around 4th year (not on purpose, its just easy to pick it up when your best friend does it and you hate you your life).
  • Sev doesnt drink nearly as much as muds tho, and he kinda doesnt like it, or at least how much murdoc does it, but tries to keep that to himself too
  • Sev definetly sells potions to other students. Murdoc sells moonshine he makes in his own personal still, and muggle cassettes and videos. They help each other out when it comes to their “business ventures” a lot
  • Muds and Sev love to sit down, have a smoke, and talk shit about the mauraders, their dads, their teachers, all of society, everything. Its their favorite pasttime lol
  • Both of them have a bit of a temper, but murdocs is worse. Hes also more likely to get physical with people than Severus, and attack first rather than defend himself. Sev always backs him up tho
  • A lot of people act like murdoc is a bad influence on Severus, which pisses him off; among other things, he knows they feel that way about him with Lily

summary:
Remus: hey, do you have a bag that I can borrow? 
Sirius: the only bags I have are these bags under my eyes, and they are...
body:
Remus: hey, do you have a bag that I can borrow?

Sirius: the only bags I have are these bags under my eyes, and they are specifically designed to carry the burden of my existence.

Remus: literally all you had to say was no.

This blog May contain PotC, PJO, THG, CAoS, TSoA, HP and other stuff.
I do the draw draw paint stuff.
Diana; ace, aro

body:
Salazar Slytherin

Salazar was irish and he was also a known Parselmouth.

But

Snakes don’t live in Ireland. There are few species of sea turtles that never come ashore and one tipe of lizard but no snakes.

Also, sinks were invented in the 18th century. Salazar lived around 10th - 11th century. How the F did he mark the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets on a sink?

Also life expectancy in Ireland at that time was about 35-40 years. Colds and fever were very common, the climate being maritime influenced, alwais moist, rarely cold, it was the perfect mediun for epidemics.

+ that period was full of wars, duels, assassination.

Wizard or not, the guy had no chance to live past 60.

title: Un nuevo profesor
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RsZQ7g

by Photohawk

Remus Lupin es el nuevo profesor de Defensa Contra las Artes Oscuras. Sin lugar a dudas, no pensó como es debido antes de aceptar esta propuesta de trabajo. ¿Pero desde cuando un Gryffindor toma las decisiones más sensatas? - Wolfstar.

blog.name: sweetlialia
blog.title: Lia
blog.description: Mostly HP but non exclusively // Huffelpuff and proud // sometimes I write but I mostly reblog

title: Someone new (part 2)
body:
part 1

“Maybe I can show you the place?” Neville proposed. Harry had finally left his cloak and shoes and fell his cheeks burned a little when he realised he was wearing mismatching socks with a hole in one. “and I can maybe offer you some slippers?” he casually added before Pansy try a joke on Dobby’s old present.

Wearing a pair of white slippers with rabbit ears on the front, Harry climbed the stairs to the first floor, looking at the pictures framed on the walls. A few of them were family pictures, mostly of Neville’s side and one was of Blaise and his mother. The others showed friends laughing or smiling at different ages. He surprisingly found himself on two of them: one with Ron, Hermione and Neville in first or second year and one more recent from one of their night out during the Triwizard Tournament. Seamus was laughing so much in this one he was literally bent in two.

“I hope you don’t mind.

-No no, it’s okay. I really like this one.

-It’s lame I can’t recall the joke Luna made that day. So, here’s Draco old bedroom.”  He said as they reach the top of the stairs, cautiously opening the door in front of them. “He wasn’t there when they got the house so he got the smallest but as he never slept in it anyway he decided it would be best for the nursery. It’s not done yet.” He informed after they stepped inside the room. 

Two walls were painted with a light shade of green as the other two were slightly grey with white animal shapes. An old wooden cradle with the matching changing table and wardrobe filled the room. Their colour has slowly faded away with time, and it made no doubt that they were older than them. “They need a little bit of woodwork and a stroke of fresh paint.” He listed as Harry’s hand trailed on the tiny bed. “And we’ve got that old mobile too.” he said, holding it out of under some covers.

“Were they yours? Or Pansy’s?” Harry asked, rapt with wonder. The room was amazing.  The baby wasn’t even there, but he could feel her presence in the air.

“I told you nanny wouldn’t help us ‘til the baby’s here, and Pansy’s parents… they aren’t really happy with the new so… they kind of disown her you know? It all comes from Narcissa.

-Narcissa?

-Narcissa Malfoy. Draco’s mother. They were in Malfoy family for generations so it really means a lot to her. She’s kinda like a second mom to her, more now than ever.

-Oh.

-They aren’t cursed, you know. It’s just old baby furniture.

-It’s really pretty.

-Thank you. Ready for the rest of the tour?” he asked as they hear the oven bell. “There you got my room.” He said, opening the first of the three doors on the side. “Pansy had transfigurate an old mattress in a bed when she moved in but it wasn’t really comfortable so I took my old bedroom stuff.” As he had imagined, Neville bedroom was as untidy as his dorm at Hogwarts but there was no doubt that Pansy has spent hours making it look as cosy as humanly possible, while dealing with the garish colour of the Gryffindor house.

“You still have you remembrall.” He joyfully point out as he saw the crystal ball on the drawer.

“I’ll need it more than ever!” Neville laughed, heading toward the corridor. “Here you have Blaise and Draco’s room, and the next door is Theo. And here the bathroom. One for five is clearly not enough as they all spent too much time in it.

-I thought you’ll live with Pansy alone.

-Not yet but that’s the plan. We’re staying here ‘til we can afford a place on our own.

-So you’re all living together?

-Yep. It’s going greatly, don’t worry.” He assured, going downstairs. “I’ve spend most of the summer here. It’s been really weird in the beginning but not as tense as I’ve anticipated. Maybe you’ll see them tonight.”

So, here’s Draco old bedroom.”  He said as they reach the top of the stairs, cautiously opening the door in front of them. “He wasn’t there when they got the house so he got the smallest but as he never slept in it anyway he decided it would be best for the nursery. It’s not done yet.” He informed after they stepped inside the room. 

Two walls were painted with a light shade of green as the other two were slightly grey with white animal shapes. An old wooden cradle with the matching changing table and wardrobe filled the room. Their colour has slowly faded away with time, and it made no doubt that they were older than them. “They need a little bit of woodwork and a stroke of fresh paint.” He listed as Harry’s hand trailed on the tiny bed. “And we’ve got that old mobile too.” he said, holding it out of under some covers.

“Were they yours? Or Pansy’s?” Harry asked, rapt with wonder. The room was amazing.  The baby wasn’t even there, but he could feel her presence in the air.

“I told you nanny wouldn’t help us ‘til the baby’s here, and Pansy’s parents… they aren’t really happy with the new so… they kind of disown her you know? It all comes from Narcissa.

-Narcissa?

-Narcissa Malfoy. Draco’s mother. They were in Malfoy family for generations so it really means a lot to her. She’s kinda like a second mom to her, more now than ever.

-Oh.

-They aren’t cursed, you know. It’s just old baby furniture.

-It’s really pretty.

-Thank you. Ready for the rest of the tour?” he asked as they hear the oven bell. “There you got my room.” He said, opening the first of the three doors on the side. “Pansy had transfigurate an old mattress in a bed when she moved in but it wasn’t really comfortable so I took my old bedroom stuff.” As he had imagined, Neville bedroom was as untidy as his dorm at Hogwarts but there was no doubt that Pansy has spent hours making it look as cosy as humanly possible, while dealing with the garish colour of the Gryffindor house.

“You still have you remembrall.” He joyfully point out as he saw the crystal ball on the drawer.

“I’ll need it more than ever!” Neville laughed, heading toward the corridor. “Here you have Blaise and Draco’s room, and the next door is Theo. And here the bathroom. One for five is clearly not enough as they all spent too much time in it.

-I thought you’ll live with Pansy alone.

-Not yet but that’s the plan. We’re staying here ‘til we can afford a place on our own.

-So you’re all living together?

-Yep. It’s going greatly, don’t worry.” He assured, going downstairs. “I’ve spend most of the summer here. It’s been really weird in the beginning but not as tense as I’ve anticipated. Maybe you’ll see them tonight.”

trail.content_raw:
part 1

“Maybe I can show you the place?” Neville proposed. Harry had finally left his cloak and shoes and fell his cheeks burned a little when he realised he was wearing mismatching socks with a hole in one. “and I can maybe offer you some slippers?” he casually added before Pansy try a joke on Dobby’s old present.

Wearing a pair of white slippers with rabbit ears on the front, Harry climbed the stairs to the first floor, looking at the pictures framed on the walls. A few of them were family pictures, mostly of Neville’s side and one was of Blaise and his mother. The others showed friends laughing or smiling at different ages. He surprisingly found himself on two of them: one with Ron, Hermione and Neville in first or second year and one more recent from one of their night out during the Triwizard Tournament. Seamus was laughing so much in this one he was literally bent in two.

“I hope you don’t mind.

-No no, it’s okay. I really like this one.

-It’s lame I can’t recall the joke Luna made that day. summary: Okay no but imagine slytherin being a bit moody because their hufflepuff asked to use their sweater, slytherin thinking it would...
body:
Okay no but imagine slytherin being a bit moody because their hufflepuff asked to use their sweater, slytherin thinking it would ruin the hufflepuffs reputation if seen wearing slytherin colours???

Slytherin : no puff you can’t wear my sweater around the castle

Hufflepuff : but… Sly what if I’m cold

Slytherin, a bit perplexed : puff it would ruin your image, you, the sweetest happiest person can’t be seen wearing my house colours, it doesn’t fit

Hufflepuff : but…

Slytherin : it doesn’t match

And then later hufflepuff sneaks into the slytherin dorm or makes another slytherin gets their sweater for them so they can wear it. And when slytherin sees it they go

Slytherin : PUFF!! I told you not to wear it

Hufflepuff : yes I know but it smells like you and it’s comfy so I don’t care

Slytherin : but puff

Hufflepuff : SLY were literally dating I don’t think me wearing your stuff would ruin my reputation more

Slytherin, very shy: *sigh*

And later everyone at the castle sees hufflepuff and slytherin proudly but discreetly wearing each others colours, like the opposite colour hair ribbon and bows, or their sweater or socks. Slytherin is still a bit weary about it, and will fight anyone who dares to make fun of them for it
